sentences.english: Shanghai Prospers International Trade Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 公司註冊於上海市外高橋保稅區。

sentences.english: The flag- rasing ceremony of Shenzhen Futian Free Trade Zone Pirmary School now begins.
sentences.chinese: 深圳市福田保稅區小學第周升旗儀式現在開始。

sentences.english: ROOM 811，NO 1，JILONG ROAD SHANGHAI WAIGAOQIAO FREE TRADE ZONE.
sentences.chinese: 上海市外高橋保稅區基隆路1號811室。

sentences.english: No persons other than the security guards shall reside in the bonded areas.
sentences.chinese: 除安全保衛人員外，其他人員不得在保稅區內居住。

sentences.english: Free Trade Zone, Frontier Inspection, commodity inspection, Payment Settling Bank, Shipping Market.
sentences.chinese: 保稅區，邊檢，商檢，結匯銀行，船務市場。

sentences.english: The bonded area of Zhangjiagang is the only one of its kind in the inland-river-type ports in China.
sentences.chinese: 張家港保稅區，是中國唯一的內河港型保稅區。

sentences.english: The bonded area of Zhangjiagang is the only one of its kind in the inland-river-type ports in China.
sentences.chinese: 張家港保稅區，是中國唯一的內河港型保稅區。

sentences.english: My company is registered in Tianjin Port Free Trade Zone of the wholly foreign-owned enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是在天津港保稅區註冊的外商獨資企業。

sentences.english: to contact national export processing zones and bonded zones.
sentences.chinese: 聯繫國家級出口加工區和保稅區。

sentences.english: Well-formed separation facilities will be erected on the boundary line between the Bonded Area and non-bonded areas.
sentences.chinese: 保稅區與非保稅區分界線設置完善的隔離設施。

sentences.english: Well-formed separation facilities will be erected on the boundary line between the Bonded Area and non-bonded areas.
sentences.chinese: 保稅區與非保稅區分界線設置完善的隔離設施。

sentences.english: Article 3 The bonded areas are specially designated areas under customs supervision and control.
sentences.chinese: 第三條保稅區是海關監管的特定區域。
